data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Jugovzhodna Slovenija, Slovenia today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jugovzhodna Slovenija, Slovenia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Jugovzhodna Slovenija, Slovenia.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Jugovzhodna Slovenija
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Jugovzhodna Slovenija, Slovenia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Kočevje
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Kočevje, Jugovzhodna Slovenija, Slovenia.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 145,400 people living in the state of Jugovzhodna Slovenija.
Lord, let it be said of the 145,098 lost in Jugovzhodna Slovenija that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Jugovzhodna Slovenija to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.
